title: OJK (Indonesian Financial Services Authority)
summary: The Indonesian Financial Services Authority is a government agency responsible for regulating and supervising the financial sector in Indonesia.
key_points: Regulates and supervises the financial sector in Indonesia.
Ensures stability and soundness of the financial system.
business_implications: The OJK's regulations and supervision have a significant impact on businesses operating in the Indonesian financial sector, affecting their operations, profitability, and competitiveness.
